p.ru: В конечном счете, в конце концов, со временем
p.s: Eventually
The monarchic rule was abolished and eventually replaced by the first constitutionally socialist state.
The monarchic rule was abolished and eventually replaced by the first constitutionally socialist state.
The monarchic rule was abolished and eventually replaced by the first constitutionally socialist state.
Horseshoe
For want of a nail the horseshoe was lost.
For want of a horseshoe the horse was lost,
For want of a horse the rider was lost,
For want of a rider the battle was lost,
For want of a battle the kingdom was lost,
And all for the want of horseshoe nail.

p.ru: В ожидании, вплоть до, в течение, ожидаемый, ожидающий решения
p.s: Pending
He is being held in jail pending trial.
He is being held in jail pending trial.
He is being held in jail pending trial.
Avail
I shall avail myself of this opportunity to meet you there.
I shall avail myself of this opportunity to meet you there.
I shall avail myself of this opportunity to meet you there.
Epitome
Victoria was the epitome of evil.
Victoria was the epitome of evil.
Victoria was the epitome of evil.
Endemic
This is endemic to our company and cannot occur again.
This is endemic to our company and cannot occur again.
This is endemic to our company and cannot occur again.

p.ru: Распад, разложение, гниение, упадок, распадаться, разлагаться, разрушаться
p.s: Decay
All of gold's radioisotopes with atomic masses above 197 decay.
All of gold's radioisotopes with atomic masses above 197 decay.
All of gold's radioisotopes with atomic masses above 197 decay.
Wheat
Men rise and fall like the winter wheat, but these names will never die.
Men rise and fall like the winter wheat, but these names will never die.
Men rise and fall like the winter wheat, but these names will never die.
Tamer
Let them say I lived in the time of Hector tamer of horses.
Let them say I lived in the time of Hector tamer of horses.
